summary: Fitness Body for CBBE, UNP and UNPB.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16731-1-1405599871.jpg[/img]

========================================================================================

[size=4][color=orange][b]>>>>> This is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normal_mapping]Normal Map[/url] and does [u]NOT[/u] change the Model and/or Armors in any way. <<<<<[/b][/color][/size]

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation for Fitness Blender:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

First of all make sure you have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]UNP[/url] installed.

1) Download with Manager.
2) Activate Mod.

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]How to blend:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Now navigate to your "Skyrim/Data/CalienteTools/Fitness Blender" folder
and double click "TexBlend.exe".

1) At "Set:" select "Body and Feet".
[color=orange]2) At "Type:" select "Normal".[/color]
3) Select what you want to blend from the middle list.

Make sure you stick to the priority list. But if you don't want Body Muscles for example simply skip to Priority 2.

4) Click on "Preview".
5) Click on "Blend Images".
6) Hit "OK" when completed.

Repeat step 2 to 6 for any other options you want to blend.

[color=orange]You [u]NEED[/u] to reselect "Normal" (step 2) as well as click on "Preview" every time you blend a new option, if you don't do this Texture Blender wont reset what has been used last time. And you end up double blending everything.[/color]

(You can double click any of the options to see a preview in the middle window. Double click that window to enlarge it)

========================================================================================

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16731-1-1405598711.png[/img]

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation for Optional Files:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Download one of the optional files for your Body Mod.
2) Open the archive with WinRAR.
3) Delete all the folders, except the one you want to use.
4) Close the archive.
5) Open Nexus Mod Manager.
6) Go to the "Mods" Tab.
7) Click on "Add Mod from File" (puzzle icon with the +)
8) Select the Mod from the list.
9) Click on "Activate the selected Mod" (puzzle icon with arrow)
10) Click "Yes" when asked to overwrite files.

Done!

========================================================================================

[color=crimson][size=3][u][b]Blender - Failed to Save File:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

If you get this message it most likely means your Skyrim is installed in Program Files (x86). In that case you will have to edit the configuration file.

1) Go to the folder where "TexBlend.exe" is located.
2) Open "Config.xml" with [url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/download/v6.6.3.html]NotePad++[/url].

There is two paths shown in Green:

<!-- <GameDataPath>D:|steam|steamapps|common|skyrim|Data|</GameDataPath>

and

<!-- <TexOutputPath>C:|steam|steamapps|common|skyrim|Data|</TexOutputPath>

3) Change the path in both lines to where your Skyrim Data Folder is located.
4) Remove "<!--" infront of both lines. (it should change color to Blue and Black)
5) Save the file.

Done!

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]FAQ:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Q: Can you make an ADEC version please?
A: I tried working with it, but the UV Map is horrible. So unless that's being fixed i won't bother with it.

Q: What's the difference between the Wide and Narrow versions?
A: 10% Wider Abs and the other way around for Narrow.

Q: I'm missing some options from the optional files, will you add them back?
A: No, the whole reason i had removed them in the first place was the large amount of work to update them all. The Blender tool is much more friendly in that matter and allows for more customization on the users end. So it's either the Blender or Modders files if you want a specific combination.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Credits and Special Thanks:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

xs2reality for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13377]Sporty Sexy Map[/url]
arison_c for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12179]Rebirth Female Body Shape[/url]
dimon99 for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]DIMONIZED UNP Female Body[/url]
Caliente for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE Female Body[/url]
Navetsea for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554&navtag=file/images.php?id=6554&tab=3]Body Textures[/url]
tigersan for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44/]Female Muscle Mod[/url]
